looping_key1: Agar aap game ko chala kar dekhoge, toh game sirf ek baar user se input leta hai. Aapko code loop mei daalna hai jisse ki user multiple baar letter daal daal kar try kar sake.
looping_key2: Aapko bahut jyada dhyaan rakhna hai, ki kaunsi instructions loop mei jayengi, kaunsi nahi?
looping_key4: Wohi instructions loop mei jayengi jo aapko lagta hai ki aapko repeat karni hai - e.g.
looping_key5: user se input aapko har baar lena hai, toh woh loop mei jana chahiye
looping_key6: Jab hum print karte hai "welcome to the game", woh sirf ek baar karein toh theek hai, toh isliye woh loop mei nahi hona chahiye
looping_key9: Your hangman function can look like:
looping_key10: Aapka solution alag ho sakta hai, depending on ki aap loop mei kaise enter karte hai, aur kaise loop se exit karte hai.
